text: Bleu de France (meaning "Blue of France") is a shade of blue. The color is similar to azure. It is traditionally used to represent France. It is a color commonly used by French national teams. == Shades of Bleu de France == === Light Bleu de France === This is a light shade of Bleu de France. === Dark Bleu de France === This is a dark shade of Bleu de France. == Additional information == * Its color code is 318CE7 * Its web safe color is blue * It is similar to azure == How to create Bleu de France == You can make this color by mixing blue and azure together. == Related pages == * Zaffre * Indigo Category:Shades of blue
title: Bleu de France (colour)
